body.p: The Wine development release 1.5.1 is now available.

What's new in this release:
Built-in JavaScript now preferred over Gecko in most cases.
Support for scalable font resources.
Fixes for audio and video playback.
Support for script decoding in JScript.
Various bug fixes.

p.p: The source is available now. Binary packages are in the process of being built, and will appear soon at their respective download locations.
